name: Flash Mobs and Stolen Lunches
description:
Play as Emerson, a fourth grader, who brings a home lunch made by their chef father to school. 

When that lunch goes missing in the cafeteria, the only suspects are your own classmates. Interrogate the others, find clues, and accuse who did it.

Can you figure out who stole your lunch before the bell rings and the culprit gets away for good?

Story Info:

  • The school is based off an American elementary school. 
  • Elementary school is generally the first school that kids go to (But some kids may go to preschool).
  • Fourth graders are usually between 9 - 10 years old.

How to Play:

Click the links to progress through the story.

Credits:

  • Writing: hullabaloo
  • Art: hullabaloo
  • Coding: hullabaloo
  • Coloring of Lucas's shirt: My friend

Notes:

This game was a submission to the  "I Can't Write but Want to Tell a Story" Game Jam hosted by charlmes. It was my first game jam ever as well as my first game. It was a lot of fun, and I definitely want to create more in the future!
